34  enum AtomicObjectType {
35  ANY_SIMPLE_TYPE = 0,
36  ANY_URI = 1,
37  BASE_64_BINARY = 2,
38  BOOLEAN = 3,
39  DATE = 4,
40  DATE_TIME = 5,
41  DAY_TIME_DURATION = 6,
42  DECIMAL = 7,
43  DOUBLE = 8,
44  DURATION = 9,
45  FLOAT = 10,
46  G_DAY = 11,
47  G_MONTH = 12,
48  G_MONTH_DAY = 13,
49  G_YEAR = 14,
50  G_YEAR_MONTH = 15,
51  HEX_BINARY = 16,
52  NOTATION = 17,
53  QNAME = 18,
54  STRING = 19,
55  TIME = 20,
56  UNTYPED_ATOMIC = 21,
57  YEAR_MONTH_DURATION= 22,
58  NumAtomicObjectTypes= 23
59  };
